title: Did Alexandria Ocacio - Cortez pass the law on inappropriate new textbooks?
subtitle: Robert Edward Lee was an American and a Confederate soldier known as the commander of the United States Confederate Army.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The Alexandrian Okasio-Cortez passed the "New Undecent Textbook Act," which requires the deletion of textbooks from any mention of the Confederate General Robert E. Lee.
